name: TypeHandler_createValueTest
description: Unit tests for the TypeHandler.createValue method with various types.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue_Class
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a Class object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue_File
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a File object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue_URL
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a URL object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue_BigInteger
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a BigInteger object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue_BigDecimal
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a BigDecimal object using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValue_InvalidInput
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of invalid input by TypeHandler.createValue, expecting a ParseException.
